transcript.text: At work, you may face ethically or legally tricky situations. Sometimes it’s difficult to know how to do the right thing. This training will help guide you in making good ethical decisions, giving you a better understanding of our values, policies, and requirements, and letting you know where you can go for help.

panelText.text: As a global, multi-industry business leader, we have a responsibility to always conduct ourselves ethically and with integrity.
But sometimes you may be faced with situations where the choice isn’t clear, and where getting it wrong can have serious consequences.

This training is designed to help. It will guide you in making appropriate decisions in important areas, giving you a better understanding of our values, policies, and requirements, and letting you know where to go for help.
